Articles.Content: I have like 300 KSP related stories run through my head every single day. Having to deal with a computer that struggles playing KSP, much less recording anything limits me significantly- so I feel like changing that. I would like to assemble a team of 2-3 people who will help turn my stories into something beautiful  . If you would like to help, shoot me a PM. I'm looking for help from anyone. I could use help from someone to record the video from the game, I could use an editor, I could use help with the sounds, I could do with someone who's an experienced producer. If you can help, shoot me a message and let's make this a reality.
Sounds very interesting. I sent you a pm.
